Textbook Style Guide

Elements.Figure

Figures...

Raw HTML:

<figure data-type="figure">
  <img src="emergency.png" alt="Emergency Broadcast System" />
  <figcaption>This is just a test.</figcaption>
</figure>

Cooked HTML:

Ruleset:

Composition.Palette

Another section, this time with a name.

Raw HTML:

Cooked HTML:

Ruleset:

Elements.Thing

Another thing... ...in a file this time

Raw HTML:

<div class="some thing">Yeah.</div>

Cooked HTML:

Ruleset:

2.2.1

A button suitable for giving stars to someone.

Raw HTML:

<html>
<head><title>wut</title></head>
<body class="raw"><h1>wut</h1></body>
</html>

Cooked HTML:

<html>
<head><title>wut</title></head>
<body class="cooked"><h1>wut</h1></body>
</html>

Ruleset:

div[data-type='chapter'] dl.definition {
  move-to: eoc-key-terms;
}
div[data-type='chapter']::after {
  class: eoc-key-terms;
  content: pending(eoc-key-terms);
  container: section;
  sort-by: dl > dt;
}
